Entries.AcceptBirthdayGift_Negative: What the...? Uh, I dunno what it's like where you grew up, but to me, this is rubbish.$a
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)Book_Defense: Aw, yeah... I've been looking for this one. It's supposed to be full of tips for bulking up. Rule number one... Eat a tonne of eggs! Hah, no problem! Thanks!$h
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)107: Now that's what I call an egg! Imagine the size of the omelette...
Entries.Resort_Towel: With this island open, there's no excuse to be pasty any more!
Entries.Resort_Towel_3: When I go pro, I'll holiday on islands all around the world.#$e#But for now, this place will do just fine!$h
Entries.Resort_Bar: I'm ordering a banana milkshake with two scoops of protein powder.
Entries.secondChance_Guys: I don't know if I can trust you any more, but I'm willing to give you a chance.$9
Entries.Fri4: Hey, @. I'm glad you stopped by.#$e#I'm not ashamed to say that I love my grandma!#$e#Now {{Lowercase:{{GrandparentName}}}}, on the other hand...#$e#Just kidding.$h
Entries.event_box2: Wow... It's the anniversary of my mum's death! Have a heart...$a
Entries.summer_Mon: Hey, farmer guy. You look a little burnt.^Hey Farmer girl. You've got a nice tan going.$h#$e#The more I practise this summer, the easier it'll be for me to go pro.#$e#Then you'd be able to say you knew me once. Cool, huh?
Entries.summer_Tue: If my hair weren't so popular with the ladies, I swear I'd shave it all off in a second.#$e#*sigh*... Life can be tough.
Entries.summer_Wed: Hey farm guy, I've got a question for you.^Hey Farm girl, I've got a question for you.#$b#$q 52/53 summer_Wed_01_old#Do you think I'll ever turn pro?#$r 52 30 summer_Wed_01_01#You're destined to be a sports legend#$r 52 0 summer_Wed_01_02#Maybe, if you practise a lot#$r 53 -50 summer_Wed_01_03#No, you'll most likely fail and become a salesman
Entries.summer_Wed_01_old: $p 52#Hey, when I turn pro you can say you were my first "fan". Not bad, huh?|Hey, I've been practising twice as hard so I can turn pro and prove you wrong. You just wait.$a
Entries.summer_Wed_01_02: Yeah, well I'm so good I'm not going to have to practise all that much.$u
Entries.summer_Sat: Mmmm... I smell a barbecue.#$e#Damn I could go for a burger.
Entries.summer_Sun: I got these new shoes yesterday 'cuz my old pair had a brown smudge.#$b#I just threw them in the bin. I would've donated them but I don't like the idea of some weirdo wearing my shoes, ya know?#$e#...What?$a
Entries.fall_Sun: Hey, the gridball match is on today!#$e#Sundays are pretty awesome in the autumn.$u
Entries.winter_Thu: When I turn pro, I'll be so rich that I'll get a holiday home in the tropics.#$e#Then I won't have to deal with these boring winters.
Entries.winter_Sun: Hey, the gridball match is on today!#$e#This might be my favourite day of the week.
Entries.winter_Tue4: Hey, @. Could you do me a favour?$l#$b#If you see Haley, tell her I'm busy.$l#$e#Thanks.
